Features.EasyKnapping.VoxelsPerClick.Des: Change the number of voxels that are moved, per click. Min: 1, Max: 8, Default: 1.
Features.EasyKnapping.InstantComplete.De: Change whether or not the work item should be instantly completed, on use. True, or False, Default: False.
Features.EasyKnapping.ModMenu.lblDescrip: Provides an easier way for players to knap items within the game.
Features.EasyKnapping.ModMenu.lblVoxelsP: Determines the number of voxels that are handled at one time, when knapping
Features.EasyKnapping.ModMenu.lblInstant: Determines whether to instantly complete the current recipe
